title: Noise Exceedance Rating
description: Counts of airline operations that incur noise exceeding threshold by airline and by month. The Aircraft Noise Abatement Office collects this data using an Airport Noise and Operations Management System. It is collected using remote noise monitor sites in the communities surrounding SFO. This data is collected to monitor and grade airlines' performance as part of SFO's Fly Quiet Program.

columns.name: Year
columns.description: The year an aircraft noise exceedance occurred, as measured, at a fixed community noise monitor location.

columns.name: Month
columns.description: The month an aircraft noise exceedance occurred, as measured, at a fixed community noise monitor location.

columns.name: Month Start Date
columns.description: Start date of the month the aircraft noise exceedance occurred, as measured, at a fixed community noise monitor location.

columns.name: Airline Code
columns.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) three-letter identifier for aircraft operating agency.

columns.name: Airline
columns.description: The name of the aircraft operating agency.

columns.name: Total Noise Exceedances
columns.description: The amount of noise exceedance measured at community noise monitors associated by an operator. Please see page 2 for day and night exceedance thresholds, hours and noise monitor site location map.

columns.name: Total Operations per Month
columns.description: The amount of arrival and departure associated by an operator.

columns.name: Exceedances per 1000 Operations
columns.description: This is a calculated value, it is the product of an operator’s (Total Noise Exceedance/Total Operations) multiplied by 1,000. This value is normalized to 1,000 operations since some operators may only have a few operations a month versus other operators may have several thousand operations a month.

columns.name: Noise Exceedance Quality Rating Score
columns.description: This is a calculated value, it is the product of an operator’s Exceedance per 1,000 Operations multiplied by (-10/highest Exceedance per 1,000 operations) plus 10.

columns.name: Noise Exceedance Rating
columns.description: Counts of airline operations that incur noise exceeding threshold by airline and by month. The Aircraft Noise Abatement Office collects this data using an Airport Noise and Operations Management System. It is collected using remote noise monitor sites in the communities surrounding SFO. This data is collected to monitor and grade airlines' performance as part of SFO's Fly Quiet Program.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was updated in the source system.

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded to the open data portal.
